txt.en: You should let Gwendrian know that you have thinned out the dread-turtles at Gwâl Cruban.\n\nGwendrian is at Echad Terthas.
Gwendrian has asked you to thin the number of turtles at Gwâl Cruban.\n\nGwâl Cruban is in northern Swanfleet.
'I thank you for your attention to this task. It is no easy feat to defeat a dread-turtle. You have my thanks!'
The ruins of Gwâl Cruban are overrun with vicious turtles.
'I am usually loath to harm wildlife, but the dread-turtles of Gwâl Cruban have overbred and are straining the local resources. If you reduce their numbers, I shall reward you.'
